Text: From someone who grew up in washington state, going to the reservations every year this should be a good watch thank you!
As far as vhs rips go V-10/A-10 Great special, loved it thank you so much, where did u get this btw?

I got a copy from a friend years ago and recorded it on my computer. Had it floating around one of my hard drives for all these years. Realized recently that there wasn't any copies to be found online so I uploaded it. I knew there would be some people looking for this, especially since the 4th is just a month away.
